channel.title: Rsps coder needed
channel.description:
HELLO
I am looking for some one to help me code a rsps you will be given co-owner status on the server and will be given a % of all donations made to the server. we would like to get the server running ASAP so if we could count with your help in this it would be greatly appreciated I may also ask for a bit of help with port forwarding.
I Already have the Forum Website Up Thank You -[size=12pt]Max[/size]
our Email is Dimensionscape@ymail.com

item.title: Rsps coder needed
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:7, topic:438383”][quote author=MasterMax link=topic=541100.msg3963333#msg3963333 date=1333485156]
HELLO

I am looking for some one to help me code a rsps you will be given co-owner status on the server and will be given a % of all donations made to the server. we would like to get the server running ASAP so if we could count with your help in this it would be greatly appreciated
I may also ask for a bit of help with port forwarding.

I Already have the Forum Website Up
Thank You
-[size=12pt]Max[/size]

our Email is Dimensionscape@ymail.com
[/quote]

Thank-you for creating an account and joining the community of Moparscape. Before you continue to post, please read the rules, which you have obviously neglected to do.

RULE ONE:

All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

Also, you’re requesting a programmer who will do all the work and he only gets co-owner? You’re the main owner and you can’t even set your env. variables, what exactly are you bringing to the table for this server? I also find it funny how you collect donations, for doing what? Enjoying and claiming that this server is yours, when you haven’t contributed towards it at all?

Good luck in the future.[/quote]

Exactly what i was trying to say but the short answer is Your Reatarded ;D!

Read full topic
